rawText:
HEALTH INSURANCE COMPANY
123 Benefit Lane | Claims Department
Date: February 21, 2026 Member Name: Jane Doe Member ID: XYZ123456789 Claim Number: 987654321
NOTICE OF DENIAL OF MEDICAL COVERAGE
Dear Jane Doe,
We have reviewed the claim submitted by City General Hospital for services provided on January 10, 2026. At this time, we are unable to provide payment for the following service(s):
Service: Outpatient Physical Therapy (CPT 97110)
Requested Amount: $450.00
Status: DENIED
Reason for our decision:
Medical Necessity Review. Based on the clinical documentation provided, the requested services have been determined to be not medically necessary. Under your Plan's Clinical Policy Bulletin #045, physical therapy for this diagnosis is limited to 12 sessions per calendar year unless significant functional improvement is documented. Our records show you have reached your benefit limit for this period.
What this means for you:
You are responsible for the cost of this service unless you choose to appeal this decision. The total amount you may owe the provider is: $450.00.
Your Right to Appeal
If you disagree with this decision, you have the right to an internal appeal. You must submit your request in writing within 180 days of receiving this letter.
How to appeal:
Complete the enclosed Appeal Request Form.
Attach any additional records or a letter from your doctor explaining why the service was necessary.
Mail or fax your appeal to the address listed at the top of this letter.
